title: A BOY
lyrics:
Hey ! Hey ! G.D. Hey !
Your choice drop it on me
Pameun gipettneunde jameun anogo
Neuleonan dootonggwa ssa-oogo
Eerijeori dwicheogida saenggake jamgyeo

Tto peneul bootjapgo

Ppaegokhi sseonaeryeoganeun gasa

Ee ane nae cheolhagi gadeughada

Ppooyeon dambaeyeongi ggwakchan nae bang

Home sweet home aneughada



13saliye waseo shwilteum eobshi darryeo wasseo

Meot moreuneun jashingam naegen gajang ggeun moogiyeosseo

Oreumaki riramyeon naeri magildo ittneun beop

Deulagagien neomoo neujeo boryeosseo

I can't let go



Remember back in the day

Nameun jeoldae midji mothae

Don't forget back in the day

Sonyeoiyeo geu meotjin mogsorido

Sesange sorichyeo shine alive



Nan G-dragon namdeuri mweorageon

Jakdago eoridago

Nan G-dragon namdeuri mworageon

Saramdeuleun marhae naega boreoweo gajin ke neomoo manha

Yeone indeuleun da pyonha geman sara

Ttag haruman geu ipjangee dwae bara

Boineun ge daka aniran geol ara



Shigani heurreo gamyeonseo wiro oomman ggeojyeo gasseo

Meot moreuneun yemoogam naegen gajang ggeun budamyeosseo

Oreuman giri ramyeon naerimagildo ittneun beop

Domangchi gien neomoo neujeo beoryeosseo

I wanna go



Remember back in the day

Nameun jeoldae midji mothae

Don't forget back in the day

Sonyeoiyeo geu meotjin mogsorido

Sesange sorichyeo shine alive



Shipnyeon donghan soomanheun mooleum deulgwa

Naega heurrin soomanheun ddambangul dulgwa

Naega cham a-un chagaoon nunmooldeul

Aa aa ja shijaghae boneungeoya



Remember back in the day

Nameun jeoldae midji mothae

Don't forget back in the day

Sonyeoiyeo geu meotjin mogsorido

Sesange sorichyeo shine alive

Just ones



Remember back in the day (go back)

We are the woo woo

Nameun jeodae midji mothae (forget)

Geudaero woo woo

Don't forget back in the day (way back)

Sonyeoniyeo geu meotjin mogsoriro

Sesange sorichyeo shine alive



Come back to me now woo come back to me now

Shipnyeoni jinado

Come back to me now woo come back to me now

Jinagan seweol nae jinshimeul



Remember back in the day (it's time to shine)

Nameun jeoldae midji mothae

Don't forget back in the day

Geumeotjin mogsoriro

Sesange sorichyeo shine alive
